text: rinse the measuring cylinder three times and add this water to the spray liquid if you have emptied any pesticide containers also rinse them with water and add the rinsing water into the sprayer tank do this twice more replace the tank lid agitate the sprayer to mix the product with the water for more information about using pesticides and which PPE to use visit our website
